verbose_text: To confirm that Ephexin5 was phosphorylated at serine residues 107 and 109 in this system, Neuro 2A cells were plated on coverslips and co-transfected with plasmids expressing GFP and Ephexin5-myc, Ephexin5 A/A-myc, or a previously described Ephexin5 mutant with impaired GEF activity, Ephexin5 LQR (Ephexin5 LQR-myc).
evidence: Ephexin5 was phosphorylated at serine residues 107 and 109
